message:
Error while extracting response for type [class java.lang.Object] and content type [application/json;charset=UTF-8]; nested exception is org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException: JSON parse error: Invalid UTF-8 start byte 0xbc; nested exception is com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException: Invalid UTF-8 start byte 0xbc
 at [Source: (PushbackInputStream); line: 1, column: 3]
